banner_1.title: welcome to everlean restaurant
banner_1.description: experience exceptional dining at everlean. our restaurant offers a culinary journey like no other. from our thoughtfully crafted menu to our warm and inviting atmosphere, every detail is designed to elevate your dining experience.

banner_2.title: discover our seasonal delights
banner_2.description: indulge in our seasonal menu featuring fresh ingredients and innovative dishes. at everlean, we celebrate each season with a unique culinary experience that reflects the best flavors of the time.

banner_3.title: private dining and events
banner_3.description: plan your next event at everlean with our private dining options. whether it's an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our dedicated team ensures every detail is perfect, from menu planning to ambiance.

banner_4.title: culinary masterclasses
banner_4.description: embark on a journey of culinary discovery with our masterclasses at everlean. learn from our expert chefs as they share their techniques and secrets, ensuring you can recreate the magic of our dishes at home.

banner_5.title: artisanal bakery
banner_5.description: delight in freshly baked artisanal goods at everlean. from crusty breads to decadent pastries, our bakery offers a range of treats crafted with passion and expertise, perfect for any time of day.
